Text: Super fast download. Extracted to RGH Falcon and off we go. Big thanks to uploader.

Damn! This shit just rebooted the Xbox back to the Dashboard while playing the game for 5 hours. After reloading there where no way to find the save-data to continue playing from where it stopped. I was only able to play the game all over  from beginning again. No I dont think so. Like having sex when you're most exited and the bitch suddenly wants to stop..... 

Anyway. Thank U razalgul1979. Can't say if it's the upload or the stealth where something is missing.
